Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000 to you. Considering its high quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to purchase it directly from me at a special introductory price of $10,800. This represents a significant savings of 10% off its original value. Don't miss out on this exceptional deal! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,800. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,800
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
